message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. What do you think?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $105?
I'm glad we're close, Bob! I can do $115, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I'm getting close, but I'm still not comfortable with that price. I'm willing to go up to $110, but no higher. Can you meet me there?

I think we're really close, Bob! I can meet you at $110, but I have to admit, I'm starting to think about selling to John for $80 if we can't come to an agreement. Can we meet at $110 and call it a deal?
